meanings.definition: A compound containing a metal ion coordinated to one or more ammonia molecules.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ammine under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The ammine in the solution reacted with the metal ion.
meanings.sent3: The ammine molecules danced around the metal ion in a chemical waltz.
meanings.sent4: The ammine embraced the metal ion like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering ammine molecules sparkled in the laboratory light.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with ammonia or an amine.
meanings.sent1: She will ammine the soil to improve its fertility.
meanings.sent2: The farmer decided to ammine the fields for better crop yield.
meanings.sent3: The chef ammined the meat with care, enhancing its flavor.
meanings.sent4: He ammined the solution, transforming it into a powerful cleaning agent.
meanings.sent5: The gardener ammined the plants, helping them grow strong and healthy.
